sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Line } from 'react-chartjs-2'
import { Col, Row, Typography } from 'antd'
import CryptoDetails from './CryptoDetails'
const lineChart = ({coinHistory,  currentPrice, coinName}) => {
    return (
        <>
            <Col style={{marginTop: "5%"}}>
            <Typography.Title level={3}>{coinName} Price Chart</Typography.Title>
             
                    <Typography.Title level={4}>Daily Change: {coinHistory?.change} </Typography.Title>
                    <Typography.Title level={4}>Current Price: {currentPrice}</Typography.Title>
                
            </Col>
        </>
    )
}

export default lineChart
